title: HempAmerika.com
description: In the late 90’s, the e-commerce bubble raised the dreams of a million small-time entrepreneurs to ridiculous heights. In HempAmerika.com, one of these entrepreneurs is Nils Bobgren, a technologically brilliant but emotionally unstable college student who reinvigorates his Uncle Stan’s failing hippie head-shop.When Nils’s e-commerce prowess gains the attention of venture capitalists, how will earth-first sensibilities surivive the promised avalanche of wealth? Is America ready for the “Amazon of weed?”
author: Michael Ramberg
